channel.title: Am I the only one that finds this stupid?
channel.description:
So all around the place, especially facebook, people think their cool by typing like this: [IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/12312312312.png[/img]
am I the only one that thinks that this is just ignorant and stupid? Do you agree? I just find it stupid, pointless, and takes longer to read. BTW, the poster's phone has a keyboard so its not just for typing quicker. Does anyone know the main point of why they type like this? Just curious is all.

item.title: Am I the only one that finds this stupid?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Well… this topic has outlived its purpose.

Read full topic

item.title: Am I the only one that finds this stupid?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:24, topic:381417”][quote author=Javafire link=topic=477229.msg3492649#msg3492649 date=1297040946]

I’m friends with a lot of black people on facebook (hello, baltimore) and I can’t understand half the shit they’re saying

last time i went to baltimore, i ordered a mcdonald’s hamburger, pretty simple to make right? Well the fucking casheer was droning on and on about her day (couldn’t understand any of it), and when i open my hamburger i find a huge fucking black hair right in the middle of it, oh and she also stole my change.

trololo

well it may be trolling, but it’s true XD

funny-pictures-new-mcdonalds-ad-zXj.jpg468×698

[/quote]
[size=18pt]TROLOLOLOLOLOL[/size][/quote]

[size=20pt]TROLOLOLOLOLOL[/size]

Read full topic

am I the only one that thinks that this is just ignorant and stupid? Do you agree? I just find it stupid, pointless, and takes longer to read. BTW, the poster’s phone has a keyboard so its not just for typing quicker. Does anyone know the main point of why they type like this? Just curious is all.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:16, topic:381417”]He was the reason i get a smile on my face… I guess you didnt love me as much as you said… But we gotta move on dont get the time to play these games… So you fake bitches dont get your story switch

I have no fucking idea what hes saying at the end though, as good as i am at tr0ll[/quote]
I’m guessing someone was lying, and they can’t keep a consistent story?
